segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but worry about what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying that plate she misses the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the sink edge, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she steps wrong, she'll slip right there on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is up on that unstable stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down, cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her arm stretched out eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're playing a dangerous game without realizing the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, but the inside is chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids shouldn't be climbing like that; it's not safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes my heart race just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the mom paying attention to any of this?
segments.speaker: PAR
